content: Did we stop doing an announcement for annual call for blogs?
@nikomatsakis, @pnkfelix (and others) just published blog posts can could be considered response to that, but as far as I can tell there was no official announcement.

my post today wasn't a vision for 2022. It was just something that had been on my mind for the past week+. But the point you're making is good. I'm not a member of core, I don't know if this was oversight, or a deliberate shift in how project planning and prioritization is done.

There was no call for blog posts this year. This was somewhat deliberate in that last year's didn't yield a ton of helpful results, and there was a desire to rethink how we do roadmap planning. My personal hope is that next year (or rather later this year) we bring this back with a better idea of how we actually utilize this data as a project.

rylev said:

There was no call for blog posts this year. This was somewhat deliberate in that last year's didn't yield a ton of helpful results, and there was a desire to rethink how we do roadmap planning. My personal hope is that next year (or rather later this year) we bring this back with a better idea of how we actually utilize this data as a project.

DAO implementation maybe?
